nodes.text: Star Wars Episode I: Anakin's Race for Freedom

Star Wars Episode I: Anakin's Race for Freedom is a children's book written by Alice Alfonsi and illustrated by Jose Miralles. It features Anakin Skywalker's story during the events of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The book, part of the Random House Star Wars Storybook series and includes twelve stickers.
Anakin Skywalker works as a slave in Watto's junk shop. One day a group of strange travelers comes to the shop in need of help. What happens next will change Anakin's life forever.
This is a gallery of the different cover variations of Star Wars Episode I: Anakin's Race for Freedom.
